subject: College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. added to self-imposed sanctions by Arizona’s men’s program, vacating 19 wins from the 2007-8 season and removing another scholarship for violations involving Coach Lute Olson.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. added to self-imposed sanctions by Arizona’s men’s program, vacating 19 wins from the 2007-8 season and removing another scholarship for violations involving Coach Lute Olson.
